sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP C ON A.SGROUP_ID = C.SGROUP_ID WHERE 1=1 and C.IS_USE='1'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
A.SGROUP_ID LIKE #sgroupId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, A.DOMAIN domain, A.PORT port, A.DOMAIN_NM domainNm, A.IS_USE isUse, A.IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, A.IS_SEARCH isSearch, A.IS_SECURE isSecure, A.IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, A.SECURE_PORT securePort, A.CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP C ON A.SGROUP_ID = C.SGROUP_ID WHERE 1=1 and C.IS_USE='1'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
A.SGROUP_ID LIKE #sgroupId#
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, A.DOMAIN domain, A.PORT port, A.DOMAIN_NM domainNm, A.IS_USE isUse, A.IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, A.IS_SEARCH isSearch, A.IS_SECURE isSecure, A.IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, A.SECURE_PORT securePort, A.CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP C ON A.SGROUP_ID = C.SGROUP_ID WHERE 1=1 and C.IS_USE='1' and A.DOMAIN_ID !=#domainId#

SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, DOMAIN domain, PORT port, DOMAIN_NM domainNm, IS_USE isUse, IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, IS_SEARCH isSearch, IS_SECURE isSecure, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, SECURE_PORT securePort, CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE 1=1 and IS_USE='1' AND SGROUP_ID like #sgroupId# ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, DOMAIN domain, PORT port, DOMAIN_NM domainNm, IS_USE isUse, IS_AUTO_CT isAutoCt, IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, IMAGE_PATH imagePath, IS_SEARCH isSearch, END_TAG_USE endTagUse, BOARD_FILER_GROUP_IDX boardFilerGroupIdx, DOC_SERVICE_ID docServiceId, DOC_SERVICE_USE docServiceUse, WSS_RATIO wssRatio, IS_SECURE isSecure, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, SECURE_PORT securePort, CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE DOMAIN_ID like #domainId#

SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE DOMAIN like #domain#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH=#subContextPath#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH IS NULL

SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, DOMAIN domain, PORT port, DOMAIN_NM domainNm, IS_USE isUse, IS_AUTO_CT isAutoCt, IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, IMAGE_PATH imagePath, IS_SEARCH isSearch, END_TAG_USE endTagUse, BOARD_FILER_GROUP_IDX boardFilerGroupIdx, DOC_SERVICE_ID docServiceId, DOC_SERVICE_USE docServiceUse, WSS_RATIO wssRatio, IS_SECURE isSecure, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, SECURE_PORT securePort, CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs ,A.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE ( DOMAIN like #domain# and PORT like #port#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH=#subContextPath#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH IS NULL
) or ( DOMAIN like #domain# and IS_SECURE='true' and SECURE_PORT like #port#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH=#subContextPath#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH IS NULL
)

SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE DOMAIN_ID != #domainId# and DOMAIN like #domain#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH=#subContextPath#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH IS NULL
SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO RFC_COMTNDOMAIN ( DOMAIN_ID, SGROUP_ID , DOMAIN , DOMAIN_NM, PORT, IS_USE , IS_AUTO_CT, IS_SSO_LOGIN, IMAGE_PATH, IS_SEARCH, END_TAG_USE, BOARD_FILER_GROUP_IDX, DOC_SERVICE_ID, DOC_SERVICE_USE, WSS_RATIO, CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE, IS_SECURE, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS, SECURE_PORT, CONTEXT_PATH, SUB_CONTEXT_PATH, DOMAIN_BACK, SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS
,TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS ,OPEN_PER_START ,OPEN_PER_END ,SKIN_SELECT_NUM ,SKIN_CONTENT_1 ,SKIN_CONTENT_2 ,SKIN_CONTENT_3 ,SKIN_CONTENT_4 ,SKIN_CONTENT_5 ) VALUES ( #domainId#, #sgroupId# , #domain# , #domainNm# , #port# , #isUse#, #isAutoCt#, #isSsoLogin#, #imagePath#, #isSearch#, #endTagUse#, #boardFilerGroupIdx#, #docServiceId#, #docServiceUse#, #wssRatio#, #createDate# , #modifyDate# , #isSecure#, #isLoginHttps#, #securePort#, #contextPath#, #subContextPath#, #domainBack#, #subContextPathIs#
,#tempPagesUseIs# ,#openPerStart# ,#openPerEnd# ,#skinSelectNum# ,#skinContent1# ,#skinContent2# ,#skinContent3# ,#skinContent4# ,#skinContent5# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTNDOMAIN SET SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId#, DOMAIN =#domain#, PORT=#port#, DOMAIN_NM=#domainNm#, IS_USE =#isUse#, IS_AUTO_CT =#isAutoCt#, IS_SSO_LOGIN=#isSsoLogin#, IMAGE_PATH=#imagePath#, IS_SEARCH=#isSearch#, END_TAG_USE=#endTagUse#, BOARD_FILER_GROUP_IDX=#boardFilerGroupIdx#, DOC_SERVICE_ID=#docServiceId#, DOC_SERVICE_USE=#docServiceUse#, WSS_RATIO=#wssRatio#, MODIFY_DATE=#modifyDate#, IS_SECURE=#isSecure#, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS=#isLoginHttps#, SECURE_PORT=#securePort#, CONTEXT_PATH=#contextPath#, SUB_CONTEXT_PATH=#subContextPath#, DOMAIN_BACK=#domainBack#, SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS=#subContextPathIs#
,TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS=#tempPagesUseIs# ,OPEN_PER_START=#openPerStart# ,OPEN_PER_END=#openPerEnd# ,SKIN_SELECT_NUM=#skinSelectNum# ,SKIN_CONTENT_1=#skinContent1# ,SKIN_CONTENT_2=#skinContent2# ,SKIN_CONTENT_3=#skinContent3# ,SKIN_CONTENT_4=#skinContent4# ,SKIN_CONTENT_5=#skinContent5#
WHERE DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, DOMAIN domain, PORT port, DOMAIN_NM domainNm, IS_USE isUse, IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, IS_SEARCH isSearch, IS_SECURE isSecure, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, SECURE_PORT securePort, CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE IS_USE='1' AND IS_SEARCH='true' AND SGROUP_ID like #sgroupId# ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, DOMAIN domain, PORT port, DOMAIN_NM domainNm, IS_USE isUse, IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, IS_SEARCH isSearch, IS_SECURE isSecure, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, SECURE_PORT securePort, CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE IS_USE='1' AND IS_SEARCH='true'
A.SGROUP_ID LIKE #sgroupId#
A.DOMAIN_ID LIKE #domainId#
A.DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SGROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, DOMAIN domain, PORT port, DOMAIN_NM domainNm, IS_USE isUse, IS_AUTO_CT isAutoCt, IS_SSO_LOGIN isSsoLogin, IMAGE_PATH imagePath, IS_SEARCH isSearch, END_TAG_USE endTagUse, BOARD_FILER_GROUP_IDX boardFilerGroupIdx, DOC_SERVICE_ID docServiceId, DOC_SERVICE_USE docServiceUse, WSS_RATIO wssRatio, IS_SECURE isSecure, IS_LOGIN_HTTPS isLoginHttps, SECURE_PORT securePort, CONTEXT_PATH contextPath, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH subContextPath ,A.DOMAIN_BACK domainBack, A.SUB_CONTEXT_PATH_IS subContextPathIs
,A.TEMP_PAGES_USE_IS tempPagesUseIs ,A.OPEN_PER_START openPerStart ,A.OPEN_PER_END openPerEnd ,A.SKIN_SELECT_NUM skinSelectNum ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_1 skinContent1 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_2 skinContent2 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_3 skinContent3 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_4 skinContent4 ,A.SKIN_CONTENT_5 skinContent5
FROM RFC_COMTNDOMAIN A WHERE 1=1
DOMAIN=#domain#
DOMAIN!=#domain#
PORT=#port#
DOMAIN_BACK=#domainBack#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH=#subContextPath#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH IS NULL
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH=#subContextPath#
SUB_CONTEXT_PATH IS NOT NULL
